android.support.v7.widget.AppCompatTextV.android:text: \n'Ansh' is a one of a kind eye donation app built especially to create awareness about Eye/Cornea Donation. This unique App provides it users with information about Eye, its care, nearby eye hospitals and eye depository banks. It also answers some Frequently Asked Questions about the legal process of Eye Donation applicable in India.\n

The App opens up to a Registration screen where a user can register himself or herself as an Eye 'Donor' or as an Eye 'Recipient'. 

Successful Registrants are the provided with follow-up details from the Eye Bank Association of India whom we have partnered with regards to details about Eye/ Cornea Donation and its process.

Over the past few years, our social enterprise has been closing involved with the visually challenged community and their families. Our team has extensive experience working in the rehabilitation and development of the visually challenged community for more than 10 years. We believe the fruit of technology should be made available and accessible for one and all crossing out boundaries and disabilities of any kind. 

The Ansh App with its first of its kind aim and vision aspires to create transparent awareness and it strongly encourages one and all to consider Eye/ Cornea Donation for the wider good. It is available for Free Download and usage at the Google Play Store. More information about the app can be found at our official website.
